import React, { useContext, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Dropdown, Collapse, initMDB } from "mdb-ui-kit"; import AuthContext from '../context/AuthProvider'; const Navbar = () => { const { setCurrentComponent } = useContext(AuthContext); const { isLogin, setIsLogin } = useContext(AuthContext); useEffect(() => { initMDB({ Dropdown, Collapse }) }, []); const handleLogoutReq = async () => { sessionStorage.setItem( "email", JSON.stringify({ "email": null, password: null, "accessToken": null }) ); alert("You have been logged out!!!"); setIsLogin(false); window.location.reload(false); } return ( <>
{/* */} Task Management {/*
  • Login
  • Register
*/}
{!isLogin ?
:
{/* */}
  • navigate("/user-profile")}>My profile
  • Logout
}
) } export default Navbar
